pkgmetadata.longdescription: A 'dplyr' Interface for Crunch // In order to facilitate analysis of datasets hosted on the Crunch data platform https://crunch.io/, the 'crplyr' package implements 'dplyr' methods on top of the Crunch backend. The usual methods 'select', 'filter', 'group_by', 'summarize', and 'collect' are implemented in such a way as to perform as much computation on the server and pull as little data locally as possible.
